Title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Writer: Walter Reisch (screenplay), Charles Brackett (screenplay), Jules Verne (novel)
Actors: Pat Boone, James Mason, Arlene Dahl, Diane Baker
Plot: Prof. Lindenbrook leads his intrepid party on an expedition to the center of the earth, via a volcano in Iceland, encountering all manner of prehistoric monsters and life-threatening hazards on the way.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
Production: Twentieth Century Fox, Joseph M. Schenck Productions
